717870f-a.folder: Broome Street & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY

718593f-a.text:
Centre Street, east side, south from and including Broome Street. This photo shows New York City Police Headquarters.
March 16, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NEG ~ E2D
718593f-a.folder: Centre Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

717871f-a.text:
Broome Street, south side, east from Centre Street, to and including Centre Market Place. Shown on the extreme right, is the Central Headquarters of the New York Police Department. Note the Broome Street Tabernacle at the
S.E. corner of Centre Market Place.
April 19, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
